ActEmergency Management Act
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 111 which authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the NORTHWEST TERRITORIES in respect of damage caused by the flood that affected Hay River and Hay River Dene 1 from May 5, 2008 to May 6, 2008.
